sections.description: These are the basic building blocks of Probo. This is where classes and styles are defined.
This allows you to center a page’s contents with a .wrapper. This applied a max-width: 1200px and uses margin to center it.
Create a left sidebar on your page using #sidebar-first before .page-content.
This section covers the basics of Probo’s typographic style.

sections.description: Button are used for performing actions on the page and links are used sending the user to a specific destination or page.
Link styles used in the styleguide
Button styles used in the styleguide

modifiers.name: default
modifiers.markup:
<input class="sg {$modifiers}" type="text" value="Default text box">
<input class="sg {$modifiers}" type="text" placeholder="Default placeholder">
<input class="sg {$modifiers}" type="search" value="Search text box">

sections.description: Alerts let users know if a build was successful, encountered an error or is still in-progress.
A successful build will have a green left border.
A failed build will have a red left border.
These are the primary colors used by Probo.

modifiers.name: $default-action-color
modifiers.description: Default button color and link color

modifiers.name: $tertiary-color
modifiers.description: Used for input hovers and hilights
